node.title: 'Our family is whole again': Cleo Smith's family overjoyed by her rescue
node.alt: A selfie shot of Cleo Smith flanked by mother Ellie Smith and stepfather Jake Gliddon at the beach.
node.description: After using her Instagram account to raise awareness about the search for her missing daughter, Ellie Smith was able to post good news this morning.
node.content:
["\"Our family is whole again,\"\u00a0read the Instagram post by Ellie Smith.\u00a0", "After weeks of using her Insta\u00a0account to aid the search for her missing daughter Cleo, Ms Smith was finally able to post good news this morning.\u00a0", "A few hours after news broke that the four-year-old had been found alive in Carnarvon, WA, Ms Smith shot out a brief message to the more than 29,000 people following her on the social media platform.\u00a0", "Thousands began following Ms Smith's account during the search for Cleo, who was missing for 18 days.\u00a0", "", "
Ellie Smith posted the happy update to her Instagram account a few hours after the news broke.\u00a0(Instagram: Ellie Smith)
", "Cleo was reunited with her parents in the early hours of this morning after police rescued her from a home at 1am local time.\u00a0", "WA Police Commissioner Chris Dawson told ABC Radio Perth Ms Smith and Cleo's stepfather, Jake Gliddon, were \"so delighted to have her back in their arms\".", "\"Ellie and Jake are clearly emotional, but importantly\u00a0they never gave up hope,\" he said.\u00a0", "\"They\u2019re strong people, they are really strong people.", "\"They have good support around them.", "\"It\u2019s a wonderful result today, but it\u2019ll be a tough journey for them.\"", "Commissioner Dawson said he wanted to \"bring the community together\" to support Cleo's family.\u00a0", "", "
Ms Smith used her Instagram account to spread the word about her missing daughter.\u00a0
", "
'I'm in tears now'
", "Kim Nguyen, who runs the Gascoyne Bakery in Canarvon, said Cleo's rescue was \"a dream come true\".", "\"I'm in tears now,\" Ms Nguyen said.", "\"I'm so happy for her and her family. I know her mum pretty well, as well.", "\"Everyone will be happy for Ellie and Jake, and I mean the whole town.", "\"They will be so happy.\""]
